at_em_imaging_workflow.strategies.montage package¶

The montage workflow (also called stitching) operates on EMMontageSet objects and associated ReferenceSet objects.

Ingest¶

  • LensCorrectionIngest

parses ingest messages to create both EMMontageSet and ReferenceSet objects.

Lens Correction¶

  • One
  • Two
  • Three

Submodules¶
